title: Subsidiary structure such as garage (limited to one), outhouse and independent sanitary block may be permitted only in plots having area 250 sq
clause_text: Subsidiary structure such as garage (limited to one), outhouse and independent sanitary block may be permitted only in plots having area 250 sq.m. or more. Rear or side marginal distances for development along nallah or watercourses shall be subject to Regulation regarding ―Sites Not Eligible for Construction of Building‖ and
section: Marginal Distances and set-back for Residential Buildings and mixed use with Height up to
